name: PS-18. MetaBall-Voronoi Triangle
description: v4W.ENko - "PS-18. MetaBall-Voronoi Triangle. In this art illustration of "Pattern Standardization" series of artworks we can see the intractive triangle whose apexes are linked with "MetaBall" algoritnm. The "Metaball" based curves are subdivided to find the cells points of "voronoi diagram" types then.  Here we see the nice abstract interactive "flowers" as result. Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.
